title: Opulent Uzbekistan Capital Stay with Three Restaurants & Wellness Spa
description: Convenience and opulence converge in the heart of Uzbekistan's capital at Crown Plaza Tashkent. This elegant retreat is a stone's throw from the city's cultural treasures, including the iconic Amir Timur Museum and the bustling Chorsu Bazaar. Savour tantalising culinary delights across three restaurants, or unwind in the blissful Elysium spa. As night falls, retreat to your plush room or suite, where floor-to-ceiling windows offer panoramic views of the city's glittering skyline.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Tashkent, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Zulfiya khonum St 17, 100011, Tashkent, Toshkent Shahri, Uzbekistan

title: Timeless Uzbekistan Elegance in the Heart of Tashkent with Luxury Two-Floor Wellness Centre
description: Surround yourself with Uzbekistan's spellbinding and rich culture when you stay at InterContinental Tashkent Amir Temur Square, an IHG Hotel. Recharge mind and body at the luxurious, two-floor Eâ€™quilibrium spa, home to a traditional Turkish hammam, before heading over to the pool bar for healthy juices, smoothies, cordials and infusions. Once you've built up an appetite, the onsite Ember Restaurant calls with its succulent prime cuts and accompaniments.
offer_address: 2 Shakhrisabz Street, Yunusobod Street, Tashkent 100000, Uzbekistan
